# SCNReferenceLoadingPolicy

**Enumeration**

Options for when to load the reference node’s content, used by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNReferenceNode/loadingPolicy] property.

## Declaration

```swift
enum SCNReferenceLoadingPolicy
```

## Constants

- **SCNReferenceLoadingPolicy.immediate**: Load the node’s external content immediately when the reference node is unarchived.
- **SCNReferenceLoadingPolicy.onDemand**: Load the node’s external comment only when the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNReferenceNode/load()] method is called.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
